languages.text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: После убийства противника атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционные атаки{/g} архмилитанта в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (но не менее 1), и наоборот. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Killing an enemy with a melee attack makes all the Veteran's ranged attacks this turn cost −1 AP (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.
Killing an enemy with a melee attack makes all the Veteran's ranged attacks this turn cost −1 AP (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

languages.text: 每当首席战士使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}杀死敌人后，本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程攻击{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低降至1点），反之亦然。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当老兵使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}杀死敌人后，本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程攻击{/g}消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低降至1点），反之亦然。此效果不可叠加。

每当首席战士使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}杀死敌人后，本{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}内所有{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}攻击消耗的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}降低1点（最低降至1点），反之亦然。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Matar a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} hace que todos los {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g} del Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} cuesten −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (mín. 1) y viceversa. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Matar a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} hace que todos los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} del Archimilitante de este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} cuesten −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (mín. 1) y viceversa. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 敵を{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}で倒すと、この{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}のアーク・ミリタントのすべての{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}遠隔攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが−1（最小1）になる。遠隔攻撃を行うと近接攻撃に対して同様の効果が得られる。この効果はスタックしない。
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: После убийства противника атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционные{/g} атаки ветерана в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (но не менее 1), и наоборот. Эффект не суммируется.

После убийства противника атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционные{/g} атаки ветерана в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} меньше (но не менее 1), и наоборот. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Wenn der Erzmilitant einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, kosten alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (mindestens 1), und umgekehrt. Stapelt sich nicht.
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Erzmilitant einen Feind mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} tötet, kosten alle seine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g} in diesem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (mindestens 1), und umgekehrt. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Toute élimination d'un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} réduit le coût de toutes les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g} de l'archimilitant pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (minimum 1), et inversement. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Toute élimination d'un ennemi avec une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} réduit le coût de toutes les attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} menées par le Vétéran pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de -1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (minimum 1), et vice versa. Non cumulable.

languages.text: Bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} ile öldürmek, o {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} Başmilitan'ın tüm {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}menzilli saldırılarının{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedelini 1 puan azaltır (minimum 1). Tam tersi de geçerlidir. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Killing an enemy with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} makes all the Arch-Militant's {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} this {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} cost −1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} (min 1), and vice versa.
